concept.title: Tracking External Email
concept.shortdesc: Analytics can report campaign analysis data in several additional key metrics with configurations made by Adobe ClientCare.

row.entry: Displays the total number of emails sent by the company. This metric is provided by the email vendor.
Displays the total number of emails delivered to email servers. This metric is provided by the email vendor.
Displays the number of times the visitors opened the email.

conbody.p: For more information on tracking email campaign analysis data, contact Adobe ClientCare. Tracking email campaign analysis data is considered on a case-by-case basis.
